pages.title: Reaching Level 90
pages.text: Accessing the penultimate tier requires a Level 80 table and access to $(9)Dragon's Breath$().$(p)With these, you can create $(9)Infused Dragon's Breath$(), a core component of $(9)Endshelves$().

pages.title: Reaching Level 100
pages.text: The highest level an Enchanting Table can reach is Level 100, but only one shelf can provide this much power.$(p)Creating such a shelf requires venturing into the outer end to retrieve a $(9)Dragon Head$().

pages.title: Reaching Level 100
pages.text: A single $(9)Draconic Endshelf$() provides enough raw strength to boost a table from Level 90 to Level 100.$(p)However, it provides no other stat bonuses.
